original_title: 引退 地味な医学部の女子大生と四畳半の狭い部屋でヤリまくった。
overview: “I want to take over my family's clinic,” says Mr. Oda, a hard-working student, always happily talking about his dreams to his friends. I was attracted to him little by little. However, even though we were in the same medical school, we had never really talked to each other. Wanting an opportunity, I mustered up the courage to lend him my notebook because he overslept and was late for class. With this, the distance between him and him has shrunk. Faster than expected...
title: Retired I Fucked A Modest College Girl Over And Over In A Tiny Room. Mako Iga
